```{r}
library(lubridate)
#個別
authorValues <- 
  list(
    name="Martin老師",  
    email="mtlin@gm.ntpu.edu.tw",
    time=ymd_hms("2020-03-25T07:17:40Z")
  )
committerValues <- 
  list(
    name="emilyluckey", 
    email="emily007@gmail.com",
    time=ymd_hms("2020-03-26T08:18:40Z")
  )
# 統整
commit <- list(
  author=authorValues,
  commmitter=committerValues,
  message="update"
)

print(commit)
```

```{r}
library(jsonlite) # 不少同學這行會有Error，還記得如何排除嗎？
toJSON(commit)
```

```{r}
      Teacher = "Alice",
      Grade = 85
    ),
    course_2 <- list(
      Name = "總體經濟學",
      Teacher = "Mark",
      Grade = 78
    )
  ), 
  second_108 <- list(
    course_1 <- list(
      Name = "作業研究",
      Teacher = "Jason",
      Grade = 90
    )
  )
)
#個人標頭
`小明的修課記錄` <- 
  list(
    name = "小明",
    semesters = all_108 
  )

print(`小明的修課記錄`)
```

```{r}

  tz="Asia/Taipei"
)
```
